Activities.Name: KeyWest
Activities.Description: 海明威家慵懒的猫猫和观光车上睡着的猪猪

Activities.Name: Brooklyn Bridge
Activities.Description: 你在桥头看拥挤的人潮，我在你身后看你

Activities.Name: Central Park
Activities.Description: 闹市中心走断腿的大公园

Activities.Name: Metropolitan Museum of Art
Activities.Description: 大都会博物馆时真的大大大大大！

Activities.Name: Shake Shack
Activities.Description: 摇一摇北美头号粉丝猪猪崽的圆梦之旅！

trips.Feeling: 其实也没有那么脏乱差，而且马克思还有点多！
